title: Metromile Names Joe Selsavage As Chief Financial Officer
text: Metromile Names Joe Selsavage As Chief Financial Officer By PR Newswire | 08/03/15 - 01:36 PM EDT Reprint SAN FRANCISCO , Aug. 3, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Today, Metromile , a pioneer in pay-per-mile car insurance in the United States , announced that Joe Selsavage has joined the company as Chief Financial Officer, effective today, Aug. 3 . Joe was most recently CFO for Hotwire, a leading discount travel site, where he led Hotwire's global finance and accounting. He brings more than 25 years of broad-range experience to Metromile and will oversee finance and accounting for the company. Joe will report to Metromile CEO Dan Preston . "Joe's proven track record as a CFO, taking a company from launch to a well-known global company and his extensive experience in finance and accounting made him the perfect candidate to step into this important role on our management team," said Dan Preston , CEO of Metromile. "We're excited to have Joe on board and we are confident that he will be a key player in taking Metromile to the next level."Joe joined Hotwire right after its launch in 2001 and was instrumental in the design and implementation of almost every component of Hotwire's financial infrastructure. In addition to his Finance responsibilities, Joe was also responsible for overseeing various other functions at different times including Hotwire's Global Analytics Team, Global Hotel Supply Team and the Global Car Rental Team. "I'm excited to step into this role and look forward to working with Dan and the entire Metromile team at such a pivotal time in the company's growth," said Joe Selsavage , CFO of Metromile. "Metromile presents a unique opportunity to work at a company revolutionizing an industry that has been unchanged for many years and is rapidly scaling with some of the best talent in the business."Before Hotwire, Joe spent more than 10 years in accounting and management functions for various organizations in the Washington, D.C. area. He received a MBA from the MIT Sloan School of Management and a BA in Economics and Finance and an MA in Accounting from the Catholic University of America . For more information about Metromile, visit metromile.com or follow Metromile on Facebook , Twitter , and LinkedIn . About Metromile
